website_summaries.verdict: A rugged, well-made tool with steel housing plus some limitations and a somewhat high price compared to others on our list.
pros: Has a trigger that doesn't require too much strength to operate and a staple-holding compartment that's easy to refill
cons: Somewhat pricier than similar models in its class
Doesn't accommodate staples thicker than 5/6", but this won't matter to all users

customer_reviews.title: SUPERB TOOL
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! One of the best hand tools I've ever had. It arrived just 2 days ago (plus a box of Rapid 5/16" staples) and I've already installed more than 60 ft of speaker wiring, stapled about 1 per ft to ceiling and baseboard pine molding, and even a few into oak. NOT ONE failed staple! Compared with other staplers: you don't have to push down; just squeeze the trigger; and there's no recoil. I even tested it into the smooth side of Masonite (about the hardest wood product there is), where the staples at least went halfway: most staplers won't even try. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: JoJesty

customer_reviews.title: Delivery took forever -- Does not work with 8mm staples -- Return process is a nightmare!!
customer_reviews.text: ...Other than that, a fantastic purchase (sarcasm.) Please take my advice -- if you're in the US, do NOT buy from Amazon UK: Takes an absurd amount of time to arrive. Returns are an arduous process of signed forms (I kid you not) and other nonsense. Stay away from Amazon UK!
customer_reviews.author: mgb

customer_reviews.title: Was great until..
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it stopped working after a couple of months. Jammed up and just won't work. Now I have to buy another one? Ugh..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought recommended staples with staple gun and it jammed now it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought recommended staples with staple gun and it jammed now it's broke! Poorly made product and over priced don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: it only takes one size staple and I'm pretty sure it's some European standard
customer_reviews.text: i have regular standard American staples and they just jam. Unless you have the special one size European staples do not buy this, it only works with the ONE type of staple, no doubt only sold by this ONE company. But let me just say THANK you to this company for finally curing me of ever shopping on Amazon again. I have had nothing but grief from doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Fed up and cured of ever shopping on Amazon again

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: User friendly. Definitely a light duty stapler. Not for multiple layers or hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: H2Sue

customer_reviews.title: I' m very happy with this stapler gun and i will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I' m very happy with this stapler gun and and meet all my expectations. And I will buy again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Juan Silva

customer_reviews.title: The right tool!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. I am using this to upholster our kitchen chairs and my hand doesn't get tired. Very little pressure is needed. It is the right tool for the job!
customer_reviews.author: F. Ogle

customer_reviews.title: great for home project
customer_reviews.text: using for home upholstery project and worked fine. I have nerve damage in my hand and thought this would make easier, but it was still hard for me to use. Make sure to order correct staples on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MBmomofour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Craft Stapler - Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This Rapid 20510450 R23 Fine Wire Stapling Gun works great and should hold up well! We have a small business and it is surprising how often we need a stapler for hanging up signs and completing various craft projects. The stapler is heavy-duty and feels substantial in the hand. it is easy to load and use, making it the "go to" stapler in the shop. I also like that is is much quieter than our Arrow stapler. Highly Recommended! CFH
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and refill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and refill. However, I would prefer if the lever was reversed like the tool I use from another brand name. The reverse handle would provide better leverage, unlike this one. Typical and standard design.
customer_reviews.author: Fathom

customer_reviews.title: Rapid Fine Wire Staple Gun
customer_reviews.text: Excellent staple gun. The grip can fit pretty much any hand. I have rather large hands and it's very comfortable for me. Easy to load, easy to use. It's constructed really well, very high quality. Simplicity is key here, it's everything I could want in a staple gun and durable to boot.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Deathwish

customer_reviews.title: Made in Sweden staplin gun
customer_reviews.text: I have a heavy stapling gun that I use on bulletin boards and when I want to remove the staples it takes a lot of effort. The R23 Fine Wire Stapling Gun by Rapid is just the stapling gun I need for the bulletin board at church. The posters and decorations hold with the staples, but they are easy to remove when it is time for a new board. The Rapid Stapling gun is made in Sweden of durable steel. It doesn’t take a lot of pressure to get the gun to staple. The gun comes with 5000standard 5/16” staples.
customer_reviews.author: Book lover

customer_reviews.title: Stronger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Impressively strong little stapler. It feels good, not too small, in my hand. It is easy to load, easy to use. Not a very strong pull required. And the staples get hammered in! I tried it on the 2x4s in my garage and every staple was flush to the wood. It would be nice if there was an adjustment to allow for different levels of penetration.
customer_reviews.author: Howard W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, even if you're a senior like me
customer_reviews.text: Thllis is easy loading and easy using. I was surprised how easyto use it is considering that I'm in my 80's and don't have the strength I once had. It's definitely durable and I expect it to still be in good shape when I pass on and leave it to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Reynolds

product_meta.title: Rapid 20510450 R23 Fine Wire Stapling Gun
product_meta.description: Size:R23 PRO All Steel TackerR23 Fine Wire Stapling Gun. Durable all steel stapling gun for securing thinner materials like fabrics, paper, and labels. For use with fine wire staples.
